scripts.dev: concurrently -k "cd lib/destack && npm run dev" "cd dev/nextjs-project && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd lib/destack && npm run build && cd ../../dev/nextjs-project && npm run build
scripts.e2e:build: npm run build && start-server-and-test 'npm start' 3000 'cypress run -s tests/e2e/build.spec.js'
scripts.e2e:build:open: npm run build && start-server-and-test 'npm start' 3000 'cypress open'
scripts.test: npm run e2e:editor && npm run e2e:build
